  • Method Details

    • createFestival

      int createFestival(@NotNull @NotNull String name, @NotNull @NotNull String place, @NotNull @NotNull String dateFormat, int duration)
      This method; check inputs, create a festivel object, add festival object to the festival list
      Parameters:
      name - name of the festival
      place - the place where the festival will be held
      dateFormat - string representation of LocalDate festival start date --- YYYY-MM-DD
      duration - duration of the festival in days
      Returns:
      on failure -1, on success index of last element in the festival list

    • addOrganizatorToFestival

      boolean addOrganizatorToFestival(int festivalIndex, @NotNull @NotNull String firstName, @NotNull @NotNull String lastName, @NotNull @NotNull String email, @NotNull @NotNull String phoneNumber)
      This method check inputs and add an organizator to a festival after creating the festival.
      Parameters:
      festivalIndex - index of the festival you want to edit
      firstName - first and middle name of the organizator
      lastName - surname of the organizator
      email - email address of the organizator
      phoneNumber - phone number of the organizator
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false

    • addStandardEventToFestival

      boolean addStandardEventToFestival(int festivalIndex, @NotNull @NotNull String name, @NotNull @NotNull String dateFormat, @NotNull @NotNull String description, int duration)
      This methot check inputs and seng signals to create a standard event in festivals vent list
      Parameters:
      festivalIndex - index of the festival you want to edit
      name - name of the event
      dateFormat - string representation of start date of the event
      description - description of the vent
      duration - duration of the event in hours
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false

    • addPerformenceEventToFestival

      boolean addPerformenceEventToFestival(int festivalIndex, @NotNull @NotNull String name, @NotNull @NotNull String dateFormat, @NotNull @NotNull String description, int duration, @NotNull @NotNull String... performers)
      This methot check inputs and seng signals to create a performance event in festivals vent list
      Parameters:
      festivalIndex - index of the festival you want to edit
      name - name of the event
      dateFormat - string representation of start date of the event
      description - description of the vent
      duration - duration of the event in hours
      performers - a string list of the performers names joining to event
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false

    • addPerformerToPerformanceEvent

      boolean addPerformerToPerformanceEvent(int festivalIndex, @NotNull @NotNull String eventName, @NotNull @NotNull String eventDate, @NotNull @NotNull String performerName)
      This method add an already created performance events performance list another performer.
      Parameters:
      festivalIndex - index of the festival you want to edit
      eventName - event name
      eventDate - event date
      performerName - name of the performer you want to add
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false
